<<<<<<< HEAD
A sermon appointed for Saint Pauls Crosse, but preached in Saint Pauls Church, on the day of His Maiesties happy inavgvration. March 27. 1642. By Richard Gardyner, D.D. and Canon of Christ-Church, Oxon. Gardiner, Richard, 1591-1670.
[6], 35, [1] p.
Printed for R. Royston, at the signe of the angell in Ivy-Lane, London : 1642.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "the sermon I heard preached". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[6], 35, [1] p.
Printed for R. Royston, at the signe of the angell in Ivy-Lane, London : 1642.
